wikipedia_page.main: Colin Malcolm Campbell, Lord Malcolm, PC (born 1953) is a Scottish lawyer, and a Senator of the College of Justice, a judge of the country's Supreme Courts.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council

response: Lord Abernethy resigned as a judge in 2007, being succeeded in the Inner House by Lord Wheatley, whose seat in the Outer House was filled by the appointment of Colin Campbell, Lord Malcolm, former Dean of the Faculty of Advocates.
* Colin Campbell, Lord Malcolm, lawyer and judge
* Colin Campbell, Lord Malcolm, Senator of the College of Justice
